title: San Francisco Maritime National Historical Park: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations               Permits & Reservations      ReservationsReservations for school groups, and other educational groups, must be made at least two weeks prior to your visit. Please call 415-561-6662  to make a reservation.Special Use PermitsAt least one month's notice and application for Special Use Permits is required. Filming permits are arranged on an individual basis. Please call 415-561-7166 for more information.Certain Special Use Permits such as athletic events and commercial films are managed by Golden Gate National Recreation Area, and comprehensive information can be found on their park website. Our park partner, San Francisco Maritime National Park Association, handles facility rentals of the ferryboat Eureka, Maritime Museum Building and several other spaces. More information is available on their venue rental website.
